name: Motorised Wheelchair
description: Single elderly male who is a stroke survivor with left side contractures of the past 7 years. He lives in a rental flat that has been infested with bed bugs. He is not on good terms with his CO-tenant and relies heavily on his motorised wheelchair to go out of home to avoid conflict at home. He needs to have the motorised wheelchair before fumigation can be done to his flat.

name: Shower Chair
description:
Client is single and unable to work due to meant health condition. She is relying on social service support for her daily needs.
Her medical condition has limited her mobility, and she requires a shower chair to ensure her safety while she showers.

name: Walking frame with wheels
description: Client (F/44) has multiple chronic health conditions and has abdominal pain which limits her mobility and strength. A walking frame with wheels can help her to move around the house more easily to go to the toilet, do simple housekeeping and  to care for her 12y/o son.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Louise Quek

name: Elevating Footrest and Detachable Armrest Wheelchair
description: 8 years old child who was diagnosed with cancer had just undergone a surgery at the leg and requires a wheelchair with detachable armrest and an elevating footrest.

name: Motorized Wheelchair Needed for Elderly Client!
description: Client is an elderly woman with limited mobility. She is presently residing alone and is dependent on others when she utilizes her manual wheelchair. The motorized wheelchair will help her to regain her personal independence and enable her to fulfil her day-to-day needs and errands with more ease.

name: Motorized wheelchair
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) Mr A, has recently been diagnosed with decompensated cardiac failure (disorder). The client ambulates around the community with his manual wheelchair, but due to his weak heart condition, it has affected his arms’ strength to push himself around. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking a donation of a motorized wheelchair, foldable if possible, to assist Mr A on ambulating around the community. 
   
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Case Worker Anthony at 96546542 or email: anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We appreciate it if the donor could deliver the item to the client’s home directly at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Ave 4. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

name: Mobility Scooter
description:
Client is not mobile due to the multiple health conditions, including a tumour in her knee. Being a mother of young children, it has been challenging for her to manage the household by herself. Her husband helps out at home but recently, he was diagnosed with arthritis and this had also affected his mobility. Due to the couple’s poor health, they have not been able to run errands and they are also not able to send their 4-year-old to school. There are concerns that the child’s development may be affected if she continues to not have the opportunity to attend school. There are no breadwinners in the family due to their health issues. They are heavily dependent on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office to make ends meet. 

Mobility scooter (preferably for two passenger so that client’s husband can send their child to school)

name: Standard Q ART Test Kits (50x and more)
description:
For low income families with children ages between 5 - 18 years old.
With more testing require during the current phrase, the low income families are experiencing difficulties in affording more test kits, especially families with many children. Hence, need support in donations of Standard Q ART Test Kits. Donors can get in touch with me on delivering the test kits to our office at (20 Lengkok Bahru, Playground Block, #03-02, Singapore 159053). Thank you!

name: Blood Glucose Meter
description: Client is an elderly person with multiple medical conditions. She is unemployed and is unable to afford a blood sugar measuring meter to monitor her blood sugar level

name: Diapers (Lifree)
description: Recently divorced elderly, 70 years old, requires assistance with getting diapers as she is unable to afford them on her own. Due to her recent change in marital status, she is no longer supported by her children or ex-husband, leaving her with rental and bill arrears. Hoping to find a donor who would be able to sponsor some adult diapers so she may alleviate costs for her medical needs. She prefers Lifree brand as it does not cause discomfort to her.

name: ART kit
description:
For clients from low-income family with children of age 5 -21 years old. With more testing needed during the current phase, low-income families would have difficulties affording more test kits, especially families with many children or families with young and old.

Donor could send the test kit to SHINE Children & Youth Services (Clementi):
329 Clementi Ave 2, 
#01-248, 
Singapore 120329

description: Family has 3 young children at home, with mother caring for youngest baby and not working. Father is working odd job and their assistance will only come in late November/early December.

name: S26 Gold Progress Stage 3 (6 packs)
description: Low-income family with three children, father sole breadwinner with low-paying job, struggling to afford milk and diapers for 1 year old baby.

name: Family require 4 tins of Similac Stage 1 Total Comfort
description: This is a family of 5 with a sole breadwinner providing for 3 young children below 7 years old and 1 infant. With the high costs for children's basic necessities, they would benefit from donors who can kindly assist with diapers and milk powder.

name: Merries Pants Diapers (size L and size XL)
description: Low-income family of 2 young children, 10 mths and 2 years old, require diapers for the children (L size and XL size). Wife is the sole breadwinner and spouse is unemployed due to LTVP. Any quantity is appreciated! The family is experiencing financial constraints due to the high expenses for the milk powders and diapers.

name: Diapers and Milk Powder for Families at Yishun
description: Families living at Yishun communities are currently in need of diapers and milk powders. 1.Drypers Diapers: Pull Up Pants and Tape Diapers (Size L, XL and XXL), 2. Milk powder: Dugro stage 1, 3 and 4, 900g Abbott Grow Toddler (1-3 years).We welcome whatever quantities that the donor wishes to donate. Please contact us for delivery details (Email: dik@childrensociety.org.sg, Contact No.: 9436 7401). *Note: Delivery costs will be covered by donors. Thank you for your kind donation!

name: Milk Powder Similac Follow On Stage 3
description:
Low income family look for support with milk powder and Diapers (L size) for the next 2 months to ease their financial difficulties. Family with 5 young children is in need of milk powder for their 11 months old child who can only consume Similac Follow On Stage 3. Parents have tried other milk powder but baby will have diarrhea. 

Father's income was recently affected by quarantine order for their children and the school HBL (total 2 weeks). Mother is 8 months pregnant and father income will again be affected (no overtime + allowances) when he takes his paternity leave (2 weeks) next month.

name: Dryper XL size diapers
description: young family living in a rental unit. Client just found a job recently. the family requires some assistance with their toddler's basic needs for these few months as the adjust to the change.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Janetta Tan

name: diaper - Drypers dry XL (tape)
description: Client is a mother, functioning as sole caregiver for her 2 toddler children. Client is unemployed due to unforeseen circumstances and solely relying on financial assistance for family household expenses. Would appreciate if donor can sponsor diapers (6 pkts) for her toddler children.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: Milk & Diapers
description: Family is unable to afford specific brands of milk, (Pediasure Triplesure Ready to Drink Botttled Milk – Vanilla flavour) and diapers (Huggies platinum diapers, size L) for her 2 year old daughter who is suffering from skin sensitivity and problems feeding. Family is in a dire financial situation as they had unexpected expenses (appliances were spoilt) and had to make purchases  Family has no breadwinner as client is certified medically unfit for work, husband is facing immigrations issues in Singapore and other child is still schooling.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Toa Payoh
contact.name: Merissa Boh

name: Merries Diapers Pants Size L
description:
A low income family is requesting for baby diapers specifically Merries brand for their toddler who is experiencing severe eczema.  
Wife is currently heavily pregnant and is due in Nov 2021. Husband is the sole breadwinner of the family and is a low income earner. The couple currently lives with their 1 yr old daughter, who has medical conditions involving her skin condition and requires special care. Their daughter has been in an out of hospital/clinics due to the skin condition and this strains the family's expensss further. Client plans to seek employment after her confinement ends to support the family. She used to work multiple jobs but currently is unemployed due to her pregnancy and caregiving issues for her toddler. With husband’s meagre income, they are unable to afford some of the basic necessities for their kids. The family is living in a 2 room rental unit. Hoping for kind donations for Merries Diapers Pants Size L (for 3 months worth).

name: Groceries
description: Family of three with 4-year-old son are facing financial constraints and would require some halal groceries.

name: Washing Machine of 8kg  urgently needed for
description:
We are seeking for a donation of new 8kg washing machine to replace our existing one, that breakdown yesterday at our organisation. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. WE have total about 80 to 90 in house stay of residents and staffs. The Helping Hand is a Volunteer Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service.
The washing machine is to allow our residents to wash their own clothing. The machine can be top load or front load.

name: Food Ration for Needy Family
description: Fresh food items and groceries are needed by the family to alleviate the living expenses. All items need to be halal certified. A) Dry & canned food: Rice - 1 x 5kg, Eggs- 2x dozen eggs, Milo packet drinks -24 packets, White bread- 2 loaves, Nutella- 1 x 900g, Fever Cooling Gel Sheets (Children, brand Salonpas) - 4 packets, UHT Milk (brand:Farmhouse) - 3 packets, Campbell Instant Soup (Cream of Mushroom) - 2 packets, Campbell Instant Soup (Cream of Chicken) - 2 packets, Instant Noodles Maggi (Curry) - 1 packet. B) Fresh:Fruits (banana, red apple, rockmelon, watermelon, mango) – any amount	any fruits any amount. C) Wet/frozen: Chicken nuggets (brnad: freezepak) - 2 x 1kg, Fresh chicken pieces - 2 sets of chicken pieces, Fishball	dodo - 2 packets, Crabsticks - 2 packets. The items will be directly delivered to beneficiary's place and please contact us for delivery details (email:dik@childrensociety.org.sg, contact: 9436 7401). We appreciate any quantity/item for donation.  Thank you!

name: Laptop
description: Client is a single mother with 2 young children and she requires a laptop for her children's schoolwork. Client is low income and unable to afford laptop. Kindly contact 83226427 should you wish to donate. Thank you!

name: 3 packets of drypers/huggies XXL (pull up pants
description:
Client works part time as a school canteen staff and has multiple dependents at home. She has difficulty meeting the diaper needs of elderly mother and 2 young nephews (2 & 4 years old). 

She requires 3 packets of TENA M size (pull up pants), 3 packets of huggies/drypers XL(pull up pants), and 3 packets of drypers/huggies XXL (pull up pants.

name: Stage 4 Dugro Milk Formula (2-3 bottles)
description:
Client (28/M) resided with his wife (34/F) and 2 sons (3/M and 3/M). Client is currently employed as a food delivery man and wife employed as a part-time clinic assistant. Family is also supported by SSO@Woodlands for ComCare Assistance but still struggles to cope due to monthly repayment of debs previously incurred. Client's income was recently further impacted due to severe eczema experienced that led him to be hospitalized, affecting his ability to maintain employment. Client wishes to support the family in greater capacity but identifies limitations in doing so currently due to his mental health concerns. Client is unable to acquire support from her family of origin due to history of strained relationships. Client shared on family's attempt in coping with difficulties encountered but faces financial difficulties, especially in the purchasing of sons' diapers. We would like to seek donations for 4 Drypers/Huggies diapers of size XL and 2 Drypers/Huggies diapers of XXL for the two sons in addressing their sanitary needs and Pediasure Milk Formula and Stage 4 Dugro Milk Formula for children's development consumption due to family's financial struggles. Your kindness is much appreciated.

A second-hand one is perfect!

name: Motorised scooter
description: An elderly client is requesting for a motorized scooter as his previous motorized scooter has broken down for a while and he is unable to walk with a steady gait after inserting 10 screws in his back and leg when he fell from the 2nd floor in 1989 when he was working as an aircon electrician. He is permanently unfit for work and requires a motorized scooter to allow him to travel further in place of his wheelchair as he feels very trapped and isolated in his rental unit.

name: Cordless Handheld Vacuum Cleaner
description: Client is 68 years old this year. She was diagnosed with Breast cancer in 2002 and suffered a relapse in 2019. She went back for treatment and has recovered from the lastest cycle of chemo treatment. She stays with her son who is finishing up his studies. Son is on bankloan for his university studies. Client requests for a lightweight handheld vacuum cleaner as she is frail and unable to handle a heavier vacuum cleaner. Donor can specify if donor has a preferred brand to purchase.
specifications: Xiaomi Xiaomi Mi Vacuum Cleaner Light (Donor can specify too)

Thus, having an air purifier will help her in keeping her environment clean. However, as she's financially needy, she is unable to afford it.

name: Hot & Cold Water Dispenser
description:
Client is a household of 6 family members. 
The sole-income earner takes on a low pay and the family is dependable on SSO Comcare financial assistance.
The main caregiver is facing health issues and is unable to support the family's financial situation apart from the caregiving of the children. 
Having to struggle with basic needs, the family do not have additional finances to afford the purchase a hot & cold water dispenser.

name: vertical steamer
description: Client is from a low-income family with 4 children. The family is facing financial strains as the wife lost her job due to coivd-19 and the husband has recently job transition to a lower-paying job. They are looking for a vertical iron/steamer however they are unable to afford it. It would be helpful for the family to receive one. Thank you!

Single mother is working but is unable to afford a new bicycle for her daughter. Mountain bicycle preferred for easier cycling. Appreciate if donor can deliver as family is unable to pay for delivery. Thank you!

name: Bicycle

Requesting for double decker bunk beds for the children so as to give them some personal space. Appreciate delivery to be send to client house. Thank you!

name: Daybed
description:
Client is a single mother with 3 children, aged 27,  21 and 15. 
Suriani is diagnosed with Diabetes and is wheelchair-bound. 
As such, there is a no breadwinner of the family as Suriani is going through a divorce and she is unable to rely on her eldest daughter for support since her eldest daughter has her own financial commitments. 
She survives her daily living highly on financial assistance and neighbors’ support. 
Her current day bed is broken and she would require a new day bed to support her current mattress so that she is able to sleep well.

name: King-sized Mattress
description: Family consists of a single mother living with 4 children and 2 grandchildren in a rental flat. They require an immediate replacement of a king-sized mattress. In-kind donation of 1 brand-new mattress will be appreciated. Family requires brand new mattress due to sensitive skin conditon. Thank you.

name: Metal Cabinet (Office/storage kind)
